question.title: Parallel Courses
question.similarQuestions: [{"title": "Course Schedule II", "titleSlug": "course-schedule-ii", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": null}, {"title": "Parallel Courses II", "titleSlug": "parallel-courses-ii", "difficulty": "Hard", "translatedTitle": null}, {"title": "Parallel Courses III", "titleSlug": "parallel-courses-iii", "difficulty": "Hard", "translatedTitle": null}]
hints: Try to think of it as a graph problem. It will be impossible to study all the courses if the graph had a cycle.
The graph is a directed acyclic graph (DAG). The answer is the longes path in this DAG.
You can use DP to find the longest path in the DAG.
